remarks: Characterization of outsideness in terms of relationship to a fourth point.  Theorem 6.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 43.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
broutsideof3 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( P OutsideOf <. A , B >. <-> ( A =/= P /\ B =/= P /\ E. c e. ( EE ` N ) ( c =/= P /\ P Btwn <. A , c >. /\ P Btwn <. B , c >. ) ) ) ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d N c $.
$d P c $.
